FROM gcr.io/clusterfuzz-images/oss-fuzz/base

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libc6-i386 lib32gcc1 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ENV UNTRUSTED_WORKER True
